title: Roku Streaming Stick 4K - Remote Pairing
summary: Re-pairing the voice remote and troubleshooting power.
content:
Remote stopped working: 
1. Unplug Roku stick from TV. 
2. Open remote battery cover. Press and hold the small button for 5 seconds until the light flashes green/white. 
3. Plug Roku stick back in. 
4. Keep remote close to stick during boot-up.
